alert.note: Alert for Osage; Washington (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 04 at 12:11PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT NORTHEASTERN OSAGE AND NORTHERN WASHINGTON COUNTIES THROUGH 100 PM CDT... At 1211 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 3 miles northwest of Pearsonia to 4 miles northwest of Sunset Lake to 3 miles west of Osage Hills State Park. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations in or near the path include... Bartlesville... Dewey... Copan... Elgin... Bigheart... Osage Hills State Park... Pearsonia... Bartlesville Municipal Airport... Hulah... Okesa... Sunset Lake... Wah Sha She State Park... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
